argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | numclwwlk.c | |- C = ( n e. NN0 |-> ( ( V ClWWalksN E ) ` n ) ) |
| 2 |  | numclwwlk.f | |- F = ( v e. V , n e. NN0 |-> { w e. ( C ` n ) | ( w ` 0 ) = v } ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_numclwwlkovf2num | |- ( ( <. V , E >. RegUSGrph K /\ X e. V ) -> ( # ` ( X F 2 ) ) = K ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_3adant2 | |- ( ( <. V , E >. RegUSGrph K /\ 2 || ( K - 1 ) /\ X e. V ) -> ( # ` ( X F 2 ) ) = K ) |
| 5 |  | #P_oveq1 | |- ( ( # ` ( X F 2 ) ) = K -> ( ( # ` ( X F 2 ) ) mod 2 ) = ( K mod 2 ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_rusgraprop | |- ( <. V , E >. RegUSGrph K -> ( V USGrph E /\ K e. NN0 /\ A. v e. V ( ( V VDeg E ) ` v ) = K ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_2prm | |- 2 e. Prime |
| 8 |  | #P_nn0z | |- ( K e. NN0 -> K e. ZZ ) |
| 9 |  | #P_modprm1div | |- ( ( 2 e. Prime /\ K e. ZZ ) -> ( ( K mod 2 ) = 1 <-> 2 || ( K - 1 ) ) ) |
| 10 | 7, 8, 9 | #P_sylancr | |- ( K e. NN0 -> ( ( K mod 2 ) = 1 <-> 2 || ( K - 1 ) ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_biimprd | |- ( K e. NN0 -> ( 2 || ( K - 1 ) -> ( K mod 2 ) = 1 ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_3ad2ant2 | |- ( ( V USGrph E /\ K e. NN0 /\ A. v e. V ( ( V VDeg E ) ` v ) = K ) -> ( 2 || ( K - 1 ) -> ( K mod 2 ) = 1 ) ) |
| 13 | 6, 12 | #P_syl | |- ( <. V , E >. RegUSGrph K -> ( 2 || ( K - 1 ) -> ( K mod 2 ) = 1 ) ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_imp | |- ( ( <. V , E >. RegUSGrph K /\ 2 || ( K - 1 ) ) -> ( K mod 2 ) = 1 ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_3adant3 | |- ( ( <. V , E >. RegUSGrph K /\ 2 || ( K - 1 ) /\ X e. V ) -> ( K mod 2 ) = 1 ) |
| 16 | 5, 15 | #P_sylan9eq | |- ( ( ( # ` ( X F 2 ) ) = K /\ ( <. V , E >. RegUSGrph K /\ 2 || ( K - 1 ) /\ X e. V ) ) -> ( ( # ` ( X F 2 ) ) mod 2 ) = 1 ) |
| 17 | 4, 16 | #P_mpancom | |- ( ( <. V , E >. RegUSGrph K /\ 2 || ( K - 1 ) /\ X e. V ) -> ( ( # ` ( X F 2 ) ) mod 2 ) = 1 ) |
